modName: CBBE for Vanilla and Better Feet for Outfits
summary: CBBE preset that actually looks like vanilla and improved feet meshes for footwraps, falmer boots, moth priest sandals, and wedding sandals.
descriptionHtml:
Let me tell you a story. I began playing Skyrim on PC in October 2013.  For the longest time, I didn't change the character models because I thought they were fine. I also didn't want to turn Skyrim into some ridiculous world where every woman is a supermodel. Then Sparrow Prince released his Booty Band Aid mod, which I liked because because it made the female model better while using the vanilla design. Then Sparrow Prince deleted the mod in an update, which I got. And so I no longer had Booty Band Aid. At this point, I decided the vanilla female model wasn't good enough. I looked at [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE[/url]'s vanilla preset, but was unsatisfied with how it didn't look exactly like the vanilla model and how I would have to replace all the meshes for female outfits to make the game consistent. I didn't want to compromise, so I looked at Bodyslide and gave it a go.

Basically, I made CBBE look as close to vanilla as I could using Bodyslide. I also modified footwraps, Falmer boots, Moth Priest sandals, and wedding sandals to use CBBE's better foot meshes using Outfit Studio. Then I did the same with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58443/?]SkySight Skins[/url]'s better feet meshes minus the wedding sandals plus Forsworn boots.
author: morry16
